name: Metrocross
overview: English Instructions RATS: If they bite your shoulders you slow down so you need to shake them off. HURDLES: Jump all of those in your path. COKE CANS: You need to jump over them. BLUE CANS: Kick them and you score points: 100, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000. Jump on them and the timer stops for two seconds. GREEN CANS: Speed cans which double your speed. SPRING BOARDS: Increase your speed; strategically placed to enable faster completion of a level. Metro Cross comprises 24 levels which increase in difficulty.
